tool.name: Gtool conversion from ped/map to gen
tool.description: Converts PED/MAP files to gen/sample files for imputation.

param.name: input
param.label: PED/MAP input file
param.help: This is your composite datatype (lped file) containing the PED/MAP files.

tool.help:
This tool converts a ped/map file into a gen/sample file required for IMPUTE2 Conversion is not necessary when doing pre-phased or phased imputations with IMPUTE2
Thanks to the creators of Gtool (http://www.well.ox.ac.uk/~cfreeman/software/gwas/gtool.html) for helping to do the file conversion.
